climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It still works! My wife plays on it all the time!!!! It does not run hot or anything of that nature. It is in excellent condition and is still very playable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am so happy I found this.
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I loved playing the xbox 360 before we had kids and spent alot of time playing army of two and resident evil. After many years of playing ours we got the ring of ☠️. I had a hard time finding one and finally found this seller. It works great and we are having alot of fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Issues every time I turn it on
reviews.reviewText: Every time I turn mine on, it either gives me the red dot on the power button, the flan blows REALLY hard for a minute and then turns itself off, or I have to do initial setup. Every time it's one of those three. I bought it at the end of August and didn't get it out of the packaging until November so I was already out of the return window.As a secondary note, the controller it comes with is a wired controller, which is not what I expected or wanted.I get that these things are a decade old, but I bought this as a backup to my original 360. My original 360 went out, I started using this one, and it's going to give out any day.Update: a week later and now it won't connect to the internet and I have to turn it off and turn it back on before I can actually turn it on. And i have to go through initial setup (pick your language, country, etc) every single time i turn it on. This thing is not renewed. My old Xbox worked better than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything came in brand new, like well-wrapped up in a box. Now, two things I didn't like, and I had to make a little adjustment: 1) Surprisingly, it came with the 3 color connectors which brings back memories when I played GameCube, N64, PS1, you name it, but my TV doesn't support it, I mean nowdays most TV's and consoles have HDMI ports now, so luckily i had an HDMI chord laying around somewhere, I used it. 2) the controller, specifically the left stick, so when I started playing games, it rotates fine, it doesn't lay on one side, but when you press it down, it doesn't work and I tried it few times. So for some games, I had to go to Options and picked a different buttons layout that I'm more comfortable with and practice few times until I get good as I was.

reviews.reviewerName: This is very good and it works really fast
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter face is so clare

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works just like my last one.
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so it's not 100% shiny and new but it's like 90% and that's good enough for me. It's refurbished but it's just like new. It started right up, came with an HDMI cable, cable for that big battery pack, power cable, and also no batteries for the 1 controller but it came with a a plug for the controller. My old 360 took a dump on me and I got this one. It was too much to fix. This worked out to be a great replacement. I bought the 2 year warranty as I do not know how long this will last. If anything all computers/electronics go bad within the first year. It did not come with instructions but that's ok I didn't need them. It has built in WiFi and that was a upgrade from my old 360. I'm going to attach the "memory pack" from my old 360 for more storage. I played Rainbow 6 Vegas 2 last night on it and it brought back some great memories from years ago. I keep the 360 in my room and I have an One S in the living room, both are for the kids when they come to visit. Over all I'm happy with my purchase and you will be too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this system renewed condition. Most games I have bought for it work great. There are a couple that have a glitching issue. Because I'm no pro by any means on gaming systems, I could not tell if it was the game itself glitching or the system. Great price and shipped and arrived quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly refurbished, tricky publication
reviews.reviewText: Console works great, nice and clean, new thermal paste and works like a charm, buuuuut I didn’t get my 250gb hard drive, seller green box sent me a black ops to make up for it, seller green box doesn’t respond to questions.
